docs.text: Sudhakar's Notebook Welcome to my Personal Blog . Feel free to browse around. It is mostly intended for my Personal Knowledge Management similar to Zettlekasten or Second Brain. Notebooks This is the notes I'm taking while reading. They are categorized into larger topics. business economics productManagement communication psychology design skillDevelopment Note : If this blog looks odd, It's because I'm taking a hands-on approach. I'm writing entire blog in Markdown with the help of Material for MkDocs and hosting at GitHub .
